statements: SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age = 25;
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, treatment FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_id, name, age, treatment FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS count_patients FROM Patients GROUP BY gender HAVING count_patients > 1
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM Patients
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Treatments WHERE outcome='Successful';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC, patient_id
SELECT treatment_name, outcome FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_date = '2022-10-15' ORDER BY treatment_name
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM Treatments JOIN Patients ON Treatments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE treatment_cost > 1000 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, experience_years FROM doctors WHERE experience_years >= 5;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, experience_years FROM doctors WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, COUNT(doctor_id) AS total_doctors FROM doctors GROUP BY specialization HAVING COUNT(doctor_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, treatment_type, treatment_date FROM Treatments JOIN Doctors ON Treatments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY treatment_type DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, d.doctor_name, tr.treatment_type FROM Patients p JOIN Treatments tr ON p.patient_id = tr.patient_id JOIN Doctors d ON tr.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE tr.treatment_type = 'Surgery';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT medication_name FROM Medications WHERE medication_type = 'Painkiller';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, blood_type FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;

SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Treatments.diagnosis, MedicalRecords.record_id FROM Doctors JOIN MedicalRecords ON Doctors.doctor_id = MedicalRecords.doctor_id JOIN Treatments ON MedicalRecords.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_date, Medications.medication_name FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Treatments.treatment_id = Medications.medication_id ORDER BY Treatments.treatment_date ASC;
